CommandDefinition.Name: createworkspacexml
CommandDefinition.Description: create workspace.xml for a given workspace

BoolOption.Name: p
BoolOption.Description: Instead of writing to file, only display content

Argument.Name: split
Argument.Description:
Decides how workspace config is stored. Possible values:
none: write everything into workspace.xml
bytype: create a config folder and one file per config type
fine: create a config folder, a folder for ervery config type and a file for every configuration entry
If not specified the existing config is reused. If there is no existing config, none is used.
